articles.title: How Americans Are Celebrating Juneteenth This Year - NPR
articles.description: Juneteenth events are happening across the country, honoring the 156th anniversary of what is often considered the end of slavery in the United States.
articles.content:
People watch the Juneteenth Parade in historic Galveston, Texas on Saturday where 156 years ago news reached the city that slavery had been abolished.
